description:
After defeating Clayman at Walpurgis, Rimuru officially became a Demon Lord and a member of Octagram. Meanwhile Diablo awaits Rimuru`s return in Tempest, and is anxious to learn about his master`s activities as soon as possible. A look back at Walpurgis.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 閑話: ディアブロ日記
